page.title: 12Parbold Information Systems!
page.content: { }The village and surrounding district is served by a mobile library van which comes every Thursday from 11 a.m. to 4 p.m. The library has been criticised because of the time of day it comes _ not a great deal of help to school children or working adults. It was also felt that the choice of books was limited and did not cater for some groups e.g. teenagers, and that the stock of books was not changed often enough. The library staff, however, do make a great effort to obtain books on special request. Some people obviously felt the need for a permanent Library, but the County Council at the moment feel that the size of the population did not warrant one.
